Supporting New Models

Source: vignettes/supporting_new_models.Rmd
supporting_new_models.Rmd

Support new models

You can easily contribute in order for report to support new models.

  1. Add report method: The first step is to add a new file, named report.NewClass.R in the R folder.
  2. In this file, write a new function with the same name (i.e., report.NewClass).
  3. This function must return a list containing 5 elements, respectively named text (a string), text_full (a string), table (a data frame), table_full (a data frame) and values (a list).
  4. This list, named for instance out, can be returned wrapped in the as.report().
